name: The Water is Wide [DEMO]
description:
"The Water is Wide" is an original RPG MAKER MV game.

[Note: the project is currently under development]

♢ You suddenly wake up in a little fishing boat,  right in the middle of the Pacific Ocean. To make things worse, you have lost all your memories! How unfortunate...

♢ However, it's not all that bad. You will now work along with your new friend Comi at her family business, the Mauri Oceanografic Team!

♢ Explore the seven seas, look for your lost memories, meet new friends, be a little bit rude, and much more!

♢ So, cheer up! You'll have a great time!

... Right?

☆ Different underwater maps to explore

☆ Sea life encyclopedia

☆ Dolphin training

☆ Treasure hunting 

☆ Original artwork

☆ Easter eggs

※ This game's final release will portray both themes and content that may result disturbing to some players. Viewer discretion is advised. For more info about this, please check the WARNING.txt file included within the game folder ※

 

✼ GAMEPLAY LENGTH:  2~ hours

✼ WALKTHROUGH: https://at.tumblr.com/toninadev/the-water-is-wide-demo-walkthrough/0mg6yulg401b

✼ CONTACT: https://toninadev.tumblr.com/
